name: Catty Battle
storyline:
Are you ready for a fun cat battle? 
 
A cat battle game where you can play together with your friends. 
 
How To Play? 
 
Game starts with rolling the dice and player turns is decided by this dice roll. 
 
Player turns can be followed over the countdown counter. 
 
All players should choose their move until the end of the count down. 
 
All players can choose the square that in the specified area around them. 
 
At the end of the count down all cats will jump to square that they have chosen. 
 
If the square which your cat juped to occupied by another cat, your cat will move to the square which available around the other cat. 
 
After every move first cat who makes the move gets to make last move next turn. 
1. Move order: red, Black, Blue, Yellow 
2. Move order: Black, Blue, Yellow, Red 
3. Move order Blue, Yellow, Red, Black 
4. Move order Yellow, Red, Black, Blue. 
 
After the moves have ended whichever square cat had landed, whatever feature is available in that square takes effect according to their jumping order. 
 
All cats start with hundred percent health. 
 
When all the moves ended all squares moves one square upward and count down starts over again. 
 
All cats should choose where to jump until the end off count down; game continues like this until there is only one cat left. 
 
Last cat who is live gets to be the winner. 
 
You can reach the descriptions of the features belonging to squares from the left hand side icons. 
 
Features in Areas 
 
Health 
Increases your health 
It varies among: 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45 
 
Mine 
Inflict damage itself. 
It varies among : 10, 15, 20 
 
Nuke 
Explodes and it is effective all over. 
It varies among : 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 65, 70 
 
Shield 
Protects the cat from all the attacts. 
It can varies among 1 or 2 turns 
 
Air Strike 
A bomber jet bombs random squares from left to right. It will not damage invisible cats. 
Damage it inflicts varies among : 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60 
 
Freeze 
Makes your cat randomly freeze one visible opponent so that opponets can not move one turn. If there is not any visible opponent it freezes itself. 
 
Drop Weight 
Drops weight on a random opponent 
If there is not any visible opponent it drop weight itself. 
Damage it inflicts varies among: 10, 15, 20, 25, 30 
 
Invisibility 
It makes itself invisible. 
Protects against air strike, weight drop and freeze. 
It can varies among 1, 2 or 3 turns 
 
Bomb 
It detonates bomb in 3 squared fields. 
Damage it inflicts varies among: 20, 25, 30 
 
Trampoline 
The jumping area doubles the selection area. 
It can varies among 2, 3 or 4 turns 
 
Laser 
It makes a horizontal and vertical laser shot. 
Damage it inflicts varies among : 20, 25, 30, 35, 40 
 
Teleportation 
It teleports itself to a random field.
